tool_description: An API to fetch the current subscriber, follower and video stats of your favourite Twitch and YouTube creators and influencers!
name: Creator Stats
title: Creator Stats

api_list.name: YouTube stats by channel handle
api_list.description: Retrieve YouTube channel stats by channel handle (custom creator URL)!
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://creator-stats.p.rapidapi.com/youtube/@TheSalvatoreGanacci"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "creator-stats.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://creator-stats.p.rapidapi.com/youtube/{handle}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "creator-stats.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Twitch stats by channel name
api_list.description: Retrieve Twitch channel stats by it's name!

headers = {

        }

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://creator-stats.p.rapidapi.com/twitch/{channel_name}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
